column5: Great News Gary!  Can't think of a better gift!  Maureen
Great news Gary...A day at a time and we will be at Lakair before we know it...
The best gifts are often the ones money can't buy.  Merry Christmas  JF
Fantastic news Gary! All the best in the New Year as well. Merry Christmas!

That is wonderful news Gary.  Glad we have such a good medical system in Canada. It might not be perfect but it sure beats being sick and loosing everything you have worked your whole life for.  All the best my friend!
Great News Gary, one step at a time, the heart stuff will be a breeze after your big C scare.  Have a Happy New Year
....That is excellent news Gary, I'm very pleased to hear it.
Thats a great Christmas gift for sure,  The big C is a scary one, I'm very glad to hear its off the table. Merry Christmas.

As some of you know ever since my bowel surgery in April I have been having setback after setback and to be honest they have taken a psychological toll on me.  I have been to 6 different specialists and been poked and prodded to the point that I didn't much care what they did as long as they found something that was making me feel so tired and weak.  Over the past two months I have had numerous tests and biopsies to determine if I had some form of Cancer.  On Tuesday last I had my final needle biopsy on my lung where there was a questionable mass.  Got the results this morning and I am for now 100% Cancer free which to me was the best Christmas present I could have received.  I'm still into some major heart stuff that needs to be addressed but we can start with that stuff after January 1ST and hopefully get back to be able to at least do 50% of what I used to.
One hurdle jumped Gary ! Good luck with the next one.  Have a Great Christmas with your family and keep the faith. Your New Years present will hopefully be just as good as this one.
Great news and the best Christmas gift to start the New Year off right!
Congrats on beating it Gary.       Merry Christmas to ya
Great news Gary! Merry Christmas and I hope you have some more good news for us in the New Year! -Brian
All the best to you Gary.
Atta boy!!!
Excellent news, Gary. When we're younger we don't realize how important good health is. May the Lord continue to shine on you and your family.  Merry Christmas to you Bud.
Fantastic news Gary.  Merry Christmas.  Joey
great news,congrats
That's the kinda stuff we like to hear Gary, thats great news !!  Really happy for ya !!
That's great news Gary.  I wish you the best in coping with your heart issues.  Is your heart doc a plumber or an electrician?
Excellent news! Merry Christmas, Gary!
Merry Christmas!!!  Wow...health is the most important thing...congrats on the test results.
Great news for sure Garyv.Best wishes and congratulations.

Fantastic Christmas present Gary  See, there is a Santa and he was listening. Congratulations on the best present you could ever receive! In no time at all you will be doing lots of  Have a great Christmas
Wonderful news Gary!!!  I hope they find out what is ailing you very soon and cure it!  Would like to see you and Amy at Lakair this coming year.
I  wish you all the best,and hope everything is great,merry chrstmas   & all the best in 08...

Gary, I am glad to hear you are on the mend... and that you have a positive outlook for 2008... just know you have 2000+ people here that care about you and would do what ever it takes to help you should you need a hand..   Get well and soon,  The Aalbers.
Awesome news Gary
That is great news what timing what a way to enjoy a worry free Christmas.  Have a good holiday Gary.  MTP
Wonderful news Gary !  Merry Christmas !!!!
Great news Gary. All the best in the New Year. For the rest of you young guys, remember what George Burns once said, "If I knew I was going to live this long I'd have taken better care of myself."
Absolutely Great News!
